title: Cannot close open apps on my new Pixel 4a.
content:
My new Pixel 4a phone does not obey either of these instructions to close one/all open apps:
  Close one app: Swipe up from the bottom, hold, then let go. Then swipe up on the app. 
  Close all apps: Swipe up to the middle of your screen, then swipe from left to right. On the left, tap clear all.
Right now, I have to go into Settings/Apps and disable each open app one at a time. 
Whatever happened to the "global" close option as on my old Nexus phone?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
